---
title: "Logistic Regression"
output: html_notebook
---


```{r}
admission <- read.csv("https://stats.idre.ucla.edu/stat/data/binary.csv")
admission

logRegModel <- glm(admit ~ gre + gpa, family = "binomial", data = admission)
summary(logRegModel)

```
```{r}
new_student <- data.frame(gre=800, gpa=3.00)

predict(logRegModel, newdata = new_student, type = "response")
```
